result.markdown: --- title: "ClinVar" author: "Saffron" date: "2023-07-27" categories: [Analysis] --- (Work in progress) Just messing around with FOXP1 gene characteristics. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(pacman) p_load(readr, tidyr, magrittr, knitr, tidyverse, janitor, broom, infer, glue, ggplot2, ggfortify, forcats, epiR, epiDisplay, epitools, dplyr, DescTools, describedata, datawizard, corrplot, caret, car, nlme) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # load data # imported from dierctory # Helpful note to self: when loading csv files from "copy path" delete 'C:' and change all \ to / CVFP1 <- read_csv("/Users/mckjo/OneDrive/Desktop/GitBlog/posts/ClinVar/ShinyClinVar.csv") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` New names: Rows: 144 Columns: 14 ── Column
